meditations.title: Morning Light Meditation
meditations.description: Awaken your inner light and set positive intentions for the day
meditations.script: Close your eyes and imagine the warm golden light of dawn filling your heart. With each breath, feel this light expanding throughout your entire being, bringing peace, clarity, and divine love.

meditations.title: Heart Chakra Healing
meditations.description: Open and heal your heart center with loving energy
meditations.script: Place your hand on your heart and breathe deeply. Visualize a beautiful green light spinning gently in your chest, dissolving any pain or blockages with unconditional love and compassion.

meditations.title: Gratitude Evening Practice
meditations.description: End your day by acknowledging life's blessings
meditations.script: Reflect on three beautiful moments from your day. Feel deep gratitude for each experience, each person who touched your life, and each lesson learned. Let this gratitude fill your heart as you prepare for peaceful rest.
